name: The Long Haul (Tableu, Maddok7, Leilia, JHRonk, Iojioji, fokai)
name_original: The Long Haul (Tableu, Maddok7, Leilia, JHRonk, Iojioji, fokai)
description:
You and your friends decide to rent a van and go on a road trip. As you all make your way, you realize that this van burns up gas real fast– it’s in constant need of refueling. What a piece of junk. As you stop by every gas station along the road to refuel, you notice that none of them have an attendant. Instead, you must win a minigame against the gas pump if you want to refuel!

Intended to be multiplayer before we ran out of time. To play singleplayer just host and start the game with an empty lobby.
